name: The night I almost lost you
name_original: The night I almost lost you
description:
This is the story of two little witches who love each other, but one of them is afraid. Fear of not being loved or not deserving to be loved and only the love of her partner can make her overcome it.

The whole game revolves around the fact that we need to know the roots of everything in order to make the right decision when the moment comes. The theme has an impact in the game, since the narrative, the mechanics, the music goes  

The game revolves around the idea of going back into the origin of a story to know its roots, but everything goes back with you. The mechanics, the music go on backwards into the root of the story.

A horizontal scrolling arcade seemed like an attractive way to show that, even in the most directed and straight gameplay style, we can always find interesting ways to tell a beautiful story.
